revised_title: Description and Analysis of a New Cephalodiscus Species (C. nigrescens) from the Antarctic Ocean
tldr: The author describes a new species of Cephalodiscus (C. nigrescens) found in the Antarctic Ocean, providing a detailed analysis of its colony structure, polypide characteristics, and reproductive system. This new species is distinguished from C. dodecalophus by its massive colony, larger and blacker polypides, and the restriction of polypides and their buds to separate tubes.
